responsibilities.responsibilty: Stood up and configured Microsoft Entra Greenfield Angular based application to be hosted in Azure to provide secure authentication and authorization of external consumers.
Customized Azure B2C policies to meet the needs of the business and integrated them into the Angular front end and C# .Net back end.
Creation of Web Services API and consumption using C# .Net 6 clients using authentication and authorization with use of JWT tokens
Received positive feedback from stakeholders and management for clear and effective communication throughout the project lifecycle.
